name: Skylands of Darmanis
blurb: A 2D indie game set in a world of super-powered outfits and customizable airships.

rewards.reward: BACKER --\r\nYour name or gamer tag in the game credits. Thank you for your support!
PLAYER --\r\nYour name or gamer tag in the game credits and a digital download of the game once complete.
BASIC ENTHUSIAST --\r\nPrevious rewards (game download & credit mention) PLUS monthly exclusive desktop wallpapers of Skylands of Darmanis until release.
ENTHUSIAST --\r\nPrevious rewards (game download, wallpapers & credit mention) PLUS a digital download of the game soundtrack upon release.

EXPLORER --\r\nPrevious rewards (game download, wallpapers, soundtrack & credit mention) PLUS a digital download of game art pdf, unused game music download, and a digital map of the Skylands upon release.  "Explorers" also receive an in-game treasure locator; an augmentation which will help you locate especially rare treasures hidden across Darmanis.

PHYSICAL COPY ENTHUSIAST --\r\nPrevious rewards (game download, treasure item, game art pdf, digital map, wallpapers, soundtrack, unused game music & credit mention) PLUS a signed physical copy of the game and a signed, printed poster of the map of the Skylands mailed to your door upon release.

PHYSICAL COPY COLLECTOR --\r\nPrevious rewards (physical game and download, soundtrack download, treasure item, game art pdf, digital map, wallpapers, soundtrack, unused game music & credit mention) PLUS a printed book of game art mailed to your door upon release.

GAME TESTER --\r\nAll $40 "Explorer" rewards (game download, treasure item, game art pdf, digital map, wallpapers, soundtrack, unused game music & credit mention) PLUS exclusive alpha-level access to the game!  Download preview versions of the game, play-test, and give feedback in the exclusive developer forum within our backer forums.  Let your voice and ideas be heard by the game developers, giving feedback that will help shape the game!\r\nTesters will also receive an exclusive Kickstarter-themed item bundle of 3 in-game items: A Traveler outfit augmentation, an airship augmentation & an airship weapon.

TESTER ENTHUSIAST --\r\nAll $100 "Game Tester" rewards (game download, play-test downloads, dev forum access, KS item bundle, treasure item, game art pdf, digital map, wallpapers, soundtrack, unused game music & credit mention) PLUS a signed physical copy of the game and a signed, printed poster of the map of the Skylands mailed to your door upon release.

TESTER COLLECTOR --\r\nAll $120 "Tester Enthusiast" rewards (physical game and download, play-test downloads, dev forum access, KS item bundle, treasure item, game art pdf, digital map, wallpapers, soundtrack download, unused game music & credit mention) PLUS a printed book of game art mailed to your door upon release.

DARMANIS INCARNATE --
All $140 "Tester Collector" rewards (physical game and download, play-test downloads, dev forum access, KS item bundle, treasure item, printed book of game art and pdf, signed map poster and download, wallpapers, soundtrack download, unused game music & credit mention) PLUS a game character in your likeness or a likeness of your design. If desired, name the character, help determine their role in the world, and provide feedback on their dialogue to match your design. Your name or gamer tag will be shown alongside the character you designed in the credits and the development process of the character will go into the game art book/pdf.

"Darmanis Incarnates" also have the rare opportunity to use an exclusive airship that surpasses all the minor airships in the game.

DARMANIS LEGEND --
All $140 "Tester Collector" rewards (physical game and download, play-test downloads, dev forum access, KS item bundle, treasure item, printed book of game art and pdf, signed map poster and download, wallpapers, soundtrack download, unused game music & credit mention) PLUS a major story character in your likeness or a likeness of your design.  If desired, name the character, help determine their role in the world, and provide feedback on their dialogue to match your design (subject to the predetermined story-driven requirements of the character).  Your name or gamer tag will be shown alongside the character you designed in the credits and the development process of the character will go into the game art book/pdf.

"Darmanis Legends" also have the rare opportunity to use two exclusive airships; the "Darmanis Incarnate" airship reward and a Legend-only airship that far surpasses any other airship in the game.

We are also inviting "Darmanis Legends" to collaborate on the game in one or more development sessions via Skype or preferred medium.  In these sessions, "Darmanis Legends" will receive an inside look at our development process, and have the opportunity to provide feedback that will shape the game.  You will also receive special mention(s) in the game credits for your contributions.
